Package gobblin.config.common.impl

This package contains the common helper classes to be shared between the client and config store implementations.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConfigStoreTopologyInspector
    The ConfigStoreTopology interface used to describe the topology of a configuration store.
    ConfigStoreValueInspector
    The ConfigStoreValueInspector interface used to inspect the Config for a given ConfigKeyPath in ConfigStore
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConfigStoreBackedTopology  
    ConfigStoreBackedValueInspector
    ConfigStoreBackedValueInspector always query the underline ConfigStore to get the freshest Config
    DummyClassForJavadoc  
    InMemoryTopology
    InMemoryTopology will return stale data if the internal config store is Not ConfigStoreWithStableVersioning
    InMemoryValueInspector
    InMemoryValueInspector provide the caching layer for getting the Config from ConfigStore
    SingleLinkedListConfigKeyPath  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CircularDependencyException
    Denotes that circular chain is detected by follow the imports path in ConfigStore.

Package gobblin.config.common.impl Description

This package contains the common helper classes to be shared between the client and config store implementations.
